name: Balloon Raccoon
description:
A 3D platformer about popping balloons!

Xbox Controller compatible!

Controls:

Jump/double jump - space, "a" button

Dive/slam - shift, left trigger

Move - WASD, left stick

Look - mouse, right stick

Game Credits: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages... https://assetstore.unity.com/packages... how cute font by Kiwana https://www.fontspace.com/how-cute-fo... https://assetstore.unity.com/packages... https://freesound.org/people/brownsug... https://freesound.org/people/CaptainY...
